name: AntonBlast Wishlist Simulator
description:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ever wanted to wishlist the BEST GAME EVER MADE (probably) from the comfort of your own home? You already can, but NOW YOU CAN! 

Add AntonBlast to your Steam Wishlist by pressing the correct key on your keyboard within the time limit! It's that easy! 

Team up with Annie to boost AntonBlast up Steam's lofty "most-wishlisted" ladder and take Summitsphere to new heights!

This training module will prepare you for the real deal, be sure to take notes for when you try wishlisting AntonBlast on Steam in real life.

WARNING - Your fingers must be thin enough to press keys one at a time (sorry Anton)!

*DISCLAIMER*

[This fan game is based on Summitsphere's upcoming game AntonBlast and is not affiliated with Summitsphere in any official capacity.]

[This fan game uses music from the game AntonBall Deluxe, composed by Tony Grayson.]

[AntonBlast Official Logo property of Summitsphere.]

[This game is not a part of AntonJam.]

++FAQ++

Q: Why does the game look so ugly?

A: Oi

Thus concludes the FAQ section

+++++++

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
